1119805932916084736.text: Tied to buy a sub at Subway today. Debit machine was broken. Could only pay with cash. Provided them with $100 bill. They wouldn't take it. Part of their policy. Tried to exchange the bill at Home Depot. Wouldn't take it. Part of their policy. Went home hungry. Bought #Bitcoin.

1118124893504192512.text: Exchanges should rename all forks of #Bitcoin. They have nothing to do with Bitcoin and should not be using its name. Getting sick of people asking me whether should buy "Bitcoin Cash". They need to understand it's just another shitcoin. It's "Bcash", "BGold", "BDiamond".

They aren't buying at $5k because "it's a bull trap".
